author: dgaudet
msg: Fall back to USE_FCNTL_SERIALIZED_ACCEPT for Solaris.  It's foolish us
wasting resources trying to solve what may end up being bugs in solaris.

author: dgaudet
msg: some systems #define s_addr s_addr_list[0].S_un or something like that, so s_addr is offlimits
